name: District courts, cases involving military vehicles
text: §605-13  District courts, cases involving military vehicles.  Any legal officer of the United States military forces, to the extent that the officer is authorized or required by the officer's respective branch of service, may without license represent military personnel in the district courts in any case which arises out of the driving of a military vehicle. [L 1878, pt of c 31; am L 1886, c 63; RL 1925, §2317; RL 1935, §3615; RL 1945, §9713; am L Sp 1949, c 38, §1; RL 1955, §217-13; HRS §605-13; am L 1972, c 190, §1; am L 1972, c 184, §1(g) as superseded by L 1973, c 33, §1; gen ch 1985]
